description:
BalinHouseProjects is an artist-run space and home.
It has published books about its activities over sixteen years.
The refurbishment was a collaboration with architect Torange Khonsari of public works and carpenter Matthias Bruene.

events.name: Drop in
events.notes: Books published by BalinHouseProjects events and Harvard Public Library about Borough history will be available.

factsheet.heading: BalinHouseProjects
paragraphs: BHP is an artist-run, not-for-profit space by artist Eduardo Padilha at his flat in Balin House, Tabard Gardens North Estate. It provides space for exhibitions, dialogue and a platform for connection with other artist-run spaces and organisations. It also creates an opportunity for the Estateâ€™s residents to experience contemporary art of a professional and international standard, locally and in a familiar environment.
